message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and uniqueness.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it.  Let me know if you're interested in negotiating further.

Hi Bob, I understand that $15000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $13500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to go up to $11500. If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to go with another seller.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're willing to go up to $11500, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $12800. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
